html_body:
<script>
const placeholders = ["Spot Led 5w", "Lâmpada Wifi", "Interruptor Inteligente"]; // Adicione mais placeholders conforme necessário
let currentPlaceholderIndex = 0;
const placeholderInput = document.getElementById("search-input");
let currentPlaceholderCharIndex = 0;
let typingInterval;

function changePlaceholder() {
    const placeholder = placeholders[currentPlaceholderIndex];
    if (currentPlaceholderCharIndex < placeholder.length) {
        placeholderInput.placeholder = placeholder.substring(0, currentPlaceholderCharIndex + 1);
        currentPlaceholderCharIndex++;
    } else {
        clearInterval(typingInterval);
        setTimeout(erasePlaceholder, 1000); // Espera 1 segundo antes de apagar o texto
    }
}

function erasePlaceholder() {
    if (currentPlaceholderCharIndex > 0) {
        const placeholder = placeholders[currentPlaceholderIndex];
        placeholderInput.placeholder = placeholder.substring(0, currentPlaceholderCharIndex - 1);
        currentPlaceholderCharIndex--;
    } else {
        currentPlaceholderIndex = (currentPlaceholderIndex + 1) % placeholders.length;
        typingInterval = setInterval(changePlaceholder, 100); // Intervalo de 100ms entre as letras
    }
}

typingInterval = setInterval(changePlaceholder, 100); // Intervalo de 100ms entre as letras
</script>
